channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Workload Scheduler
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Workload Scheduler

item.title: CVE-2020-4380|2024-09-16T17:53:52.681Z -- ibm -- workload%20scheduler
item.description: IBM Workload Scheduler 9.3.0.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 179160.

item.title: CVE-2019-4608|2024-09-16T17:54:17.264Z -- ibm -- workload%20scheduler
item.description: IBM Tivoli Workload Scheduler 9.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 168508.
